page.title: 07Children's Games in Strath.
page.content: Strath Tig is a game we play in our village.These are the rules.First we have a "greenboard".The way we do that is somone touches something like a tree or a wall and shouts"greenboard". The last one to touch and shout is "it".He counts to five hundred by fives while the rest run off anywhere in the village.When he has finished counting he goes after the others and tries to catch them.When somone is caught he helps the person who is "it".When everyone is caught the first one caught is the next "it".
